member.name: T:Pacifica.Upload.Upload
member.summary: MyEMSL Upload metadata class

member.name: F:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.DEFAULT_EUS_OPERATOR_ID
member.summary: EUS Operator ID to use when operator ID is unknown

member.name: F:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.DEFAULT_EUS_PROJECT_ID
member.summary: EUS Project ID to use when the project ID is unknown
member.remarks: We originally used Project 17797: "Development of High Throughput Proteomics Production Operations" We switched to Project 51287 in January 2020

member.name: F:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.UNKNOWN_INSTRUMENT_EUS_INSTRUMENT_ID
member.summary: EUS Instrument ID to use when the EUS Instrument ID is unknown

member.name: F:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.UNKNOWN_INSTRUMENT_NAME
member.summary: DMS Instrument Name corresponding to EUS Instrument ID 34127

member.name: F:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.EUSInfo.EUSInstrumentID
member.summary: EUS instrument ID

member.name: F:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.EUSInfo.EUSProjectID
member.summary: EUS project number
member.remarks: As of May 2019, these are now referred to as projects, not proposals

member.name: F:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.EUSInfo.EUSUploaderID
member.summary: EUS ID of the instrument operator (for datasets) or the data package owner (for Data Packages)

member.name: F:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.UploadMetadata.EUSOperatorID
member.summary: Instrument Operator EUS ID for datasets Data Package Owner for data packages

member.name: P:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Error message

member.name: P:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.TransferFolderPath
member.summary: The metadata.txt file will be copied to the Transfer Folder if the folder path is not empty Example: \\proto-4\DMS3_Xfer\QC_Shew_16_01_125ng_CID-STD_newCol-1_5Apr17_Frodo_16-11-08

member.name: P:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.JobNumber
member.summary: Capture Task DB job number for the DatasetArchive or ArchiveUpdate Job
member.remarks: The metadata.txt file name will include the JobNumber text in the name, for example MyEMSL_metadata_CaptureJob_12345.txt For DataPackages we store DataPackageId in JobNumber

member.name: P:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.UseTestInstance
member.summary: When true, upload to ingestdmsdev.my.emsl.pnl.gov instead of ingestdms.my.emsl.pnl.gov

member.name: M:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.#ctor(Pacifica.Core.Configuration)
member.summary: Constructor (TransferFolderPath and JobNumber will be empty)
member.remarks: This constructor is used by the DataPackage Archive Manager

member.name: M:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.#ctor(Pacifica.Core.Configuration,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: Transfer folder path for this dataset, for example \\proto-4\DMS3_Xfer\IFT001_Pool_17_B_10x_27Aug13_Tiger_13-07-36
member.remarks: The metadata.txt file will be copied to the transfer folder

member.name: M:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.StartUpload(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object}},System.String@)
member.summary: Update the files and data tracked by metadataObject to MyEMSL
member.returns: True if successfully uploaded, false if an error
member.remarks: This method is used by the DataPackage Archive Manager

member.name: M:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.StartUpload(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object}},Pacifica.Upload.TarStreamUploader.UploadDebugMode,System.String@)
member.summary: Update the files and data tracked by metadataObject to MyEMSL
member.param: Set to eDebugMode.CreateTarLocal to authenticate with MyEMSL, then create a .tar file locally instead of actually uploading it Set to eDebugMode.MyEMSLOfflineMode to create the .tar file locally without contacting MyEMSL
member.returns: True if successfully uploaded, false if an error

member.name: M:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.CreatePacificaMetadataObject(Pacifica.Upload.Upload.UploadMetadata,System.Collections.Generic.List{Pacifica.Core.FileInfoObject},Pacifica.Upload.Upload.EUSInfo@)
member.summary: Create the metadata object with the upload details, including the files to upload
member.param: Output parameter: EUS instrument ID, project ID, and uploader ID
member.returns: Dictionary of the information to translate to JSON; Keys are key names; values are either strings or dictionary objects or even a list of dictionary objects

member.name: M:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.GetMetadataObjectDescription(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object}})
member.summary: Return a string description of the EUS info encoded by metadataObject

member.name: M:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.GetEUSInstrumentID(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return the EUS instrument ID, falling back to instrumentIdIfUnknown if eusInstrumentId is empty

member.name: M:Pacifica.Upload.Upload.GetEUSProjectID(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Validate the EUS project ID, or use the default
member.remarks: This is a string because the project ID may contain suffix letters
